text: the space and the light here is just
kind of unlike anywhere else in the
world always around this time of year in
the autumn I start embroidering
mushrooms on my sweaters which is kind
of the same time that mushrooms appear
and then in the spring I do a lot of
like little Icelandic flowers but I
pretty much just start embroidering and
see what grows there and it's kind of
the same with the head pieces I'll start
playing around with some material on my
face in the mirror and I kind of let the
material and my mood and their
influences at the time just kind of grow
naturally here are some pieces I've been
making recently the Buick I have made
out of silicon that I cost this room for
example goes on the eye thank you
these are some of the the resin molds
that I cast them from I like making
everything by hand it's kind of the
whole point of it for me the whole
enjoyment is just using my fingers I
love that it's not an artwork on the
wall if I had to make an embroidery that
would be hung on a wall I think I just
lose interest I really like the idea
that they're just like everyday objects
they're not like framed and behind glass
you
